  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205366</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Art Meets Pop Culture: Keith Knight</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kunst-Treffen-Knall-Kultur: Keith Ritter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Culture de Bruit de Rassemblements d'Art : 
Chevalier de Keith</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cultura Do PNF Das Reuniões Da Arte: Knight
De Keith</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Coltura Di Schiocco Di Raduni Di Arte: 
Cavaliere Di Keith</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η τέχνη συναντά το λαϊκό πολιτισμό: Θ*Κεητχ 
Knight</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cultura Del Estallido De las Reuniones Del Arte: 
Caballero De Keith</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK follows cartoon artist and rap musician Keith Knight as he peddles his strip the K Chronicles at a massive comic convention. This Educator Guide explores the history and form of the cartoon.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN folgt Karikaturkünstler und Pochenmusiker 
Keith Ritter, während er seinen Streifen das K feilbietet, zeichnet 
an einer massiven komischen Versammlung auf. Diese 
Erzieher-Anleitung erforscht die Geschichte und das Formular der 
Karikatur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ÉTINCELLE suit l'artiste de dessin animé et le
chevalier de Keith de musicien de coup sec et dur pendant qu'il 
colporte sa bande le K fait la chronique à une convention comique 
massive. Ce guide d'éducateur explore l'histoire et la forme du
dessin animé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A FAÍSCA segue o artista do cartoon e o knight de
Keith do músico da batida enquanto peddles sua tira o K chronicles em
uma convenção comic maciça. Esta guia do educador explora o 
history e o formulário do cartoon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La SCINTILLA segue l'artista del fumetto ed il 
cavaliere di Keith del musicista di colpo secco mentre peddles la 
sua striscia K chronicles ad una convenzione comic voluminosa. 
Questa guida dell'educatore esplora la storia e la forma del 
fumetto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΑΣ ακολουθεί τον καλλιτέχνη και το μουσικό 
Keith Knight κινούμενων σχεδίων κτυπήματος δεδομένου ότι 
πουλά λιανικώς τη λουρίδα του που το Κ εξιστορεί κατά γράμμα σε 
μια ογκώδη κωμική σύμβαση. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών 
ερευνά την ιστορία και τη μορφή των κινούμενων σχεδίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La CHISPA sigue a artista de la historieta y el 
caballero de Keith del músico del rap como él peddles su tira la K 
chronicles en una convención cómica masiva. Esta guía del 
educador explora la historia y la forma de la historieta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
